task_description:
{'component_name': 'Main Component', 'description': "### Core Technologies:
- **Frontend Framework**: React.js is used for its component-based architecture, enabling efficient UI rendering and state management.
- **Programming Language**: JavaScript, with JSX syntax for React components.
- **Database**: No direct database interaction; relies on 'Products-API-L' for data.
- **Runtime Environment**: Node.js for development and build processes.
- **Integration Technologies**: Axios or Fetch API for RESTful API calls to 'Products-API-L'.
- **UI Technologies**: CSS Flexbox and Grid for responsive design, ARIA roles for accessibility.

### Build and Development Tools:
- **Build System**: Webpack for module bundling and build optimization.
- **Development Tools**: Babel for JavaScript transpilation, ESLint for code quality.
- **Testing Frameworks**: Jest and React Testing Library for unit and integration testing.
- **Deployment and CI/CD**: AWS S3 and CloudFront for hosting, GitHub Actions for CI/CD pipeline.

The Main Component encapsulates all functionalities of the Products Frontend I.0.2 container. It is responsible for rendering the user interface, managing state, and handling interactions with the 'Products-API-L' to fetch and display product data. This component ensures a responsive and intuitive user experience, fulfilling all container requirements.", 'interfaces': '', 'algorithms': '', 'pseudocode': '', 'local_backend_service': [], 'asset_images_b64': {}, 'available_assets': []}

Task1.task_description: Initialize and configure the React.js project with all necessary build tools and dependencies
Task1.details: Set up a new React.js project with Webpack, Babel, and other required development tools. This includes creating all necessary configuration files and setting up the development environment.

Task1SubTask1.description: Initialize npm project and add core dependencies
Task1SubTask1.details: Create package.json, add React, React-DOM, Webpack, Babel, and other core dependencies. Setup .gitignore for version control.

Task1SubTask2.details: Create and configure webpack.config.js for development and production builds. Setup Babel configuration for JSX and modern JavaScript features.

Task1SubTask3.details: Configure ESLint for code quality and Prettier for code formatting. Create configuration files and add necessary dependencies.

Task2.task_description: Create the basic application structure and implement core React components
Task2.details: Implement the basic React application structure including entry points, routing, and core components. Setup the main application layout and implement the Products-API-L integration.

Task2SubTask1.details: Setup src directory structure, create index.js, App.js, and index.html. Implement basic routing setup.

Task2SubTask2.details: Create API service layer using Axios for Products-API-L integration. Implement API endpoints and error handling.

Task2SubTask3.details: Implement main product-related components following React best practices. Include responsive design using CSS Flexbox and Grid.

Task3.task_description: Implement comprehensive testing setup and write tests
Task3.details: Setup Jest and React Testing Library, implement unit tests and integration tests for all components and API integration. Ensure proper test coverage.

Task3SubTask1.details: Configure Jest and React Testing Library. Create test setup files and helper utilities.

Task3SubTask2.details: Write unit tests for all React components. Include snapshot tests and interaction tests.

Task3SubTask3.details: Implement integration tests for API layer and data fetching functionality.

Task4.details: Setup GitHub Actions for CI/CD pipeline, configure deployment to AWS S3 and CloudFront. Create comprehensive documentation including setup instructions and development guidelines.

Task4SubTask1.details: Create GitHub Actions workflow for continuous integration and deployment. Configure AWS deployment setup.

Task4SubTask2.details: Update README.md with comprehensive project information, setup instructions, and development guidelines.

Task4SubTask3.details: Setup production build configuration, optimization, and deployment scripts.
